#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	string s;
	cin>>s;
	int n = s.length();
	int i = 0;
	int maxx = 0;
	char ans;
	while(i<n)
	{
		int st = i;
		char ch = s[st];
		while(i < n && s[i] == ch)
			i++;
		
		int diff = i-st;
		if(diff > maxx)
		{
			maxx = diff;
			ans = ch;
		}
		else if(diff == maxx)
		{
			if(ch < ans)
				ans = ch;
		}
	}
	cout<<ans<<endl<<maxx<<endl;
	return 0;
}
